name: Fire Keeper (Darenn Keller)
description:
Collect fire wisps and feed the fire before it dies. Keep the fire alive during 5 minutes to win. Use the arrows to move around. Use space to feed the fire when near it.

Special congrats for Cyril, Aurélien and Pauline, who did their first game jam, they can be proud!

Made by :

Damien Clergeaud - Programmer

Darenn Keller - Game Designer

Cyril Danon - Game Designer

Aurélien Lainé - Game Designer

Pauline Ledu - 2D Artist/Animator
